attributes.action: Avoid Double-dip Recession & Ease Taxpayer Burden
attributes.additional_details: In order to help avoid the forecasted double-dip recession in 2012 and ease the current burden on the British taxpayer, we request the government to immediately stop any further overseas aid, cut the "green" programme and wind turbine subsidies, and cancel any further contributions to the Euro Rescue Fund. We request that these issues be discussed in parliament with a free vote for all members.
